dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5283 IH: To make technical amendments to update statutory references to certain provisions classified to title 7, title 20, and title 43, United States Code.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. King of Iowa introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To make technical amendments to update statutory references to certain provisions classified to title 7, title 20, and title 43, United States Code.

section.text: Section 5109(a) of title 5, United States Code, is amended by striking section 450d of title 7 and inserting section 2204–2 of title 7.

paragraph.text: Section 32(a)(1) of the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act (7 U.S.C. 136w–7(a)(1)) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i(e)) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157(e)).
Section 33(b)(7)(E)(i) of the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act (7 U.S.C. 136w–8(b)(7)(E)(i)) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i(e)) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157(e)).

Section 1 (matter before subsection (a)) of the Act of April 4, 1940 (known as the Agriculture Regulatory Act) (7 U.S.C. 2204–1 (matter before subsection (a))) is amended by inserting (7 U.S.C. 2204–1 et seq.) after this Act.
Section 3 of the Act of April 4, 1940 (known as the Agriculture Regulatory Act) (7 U.S.C. 2204–3) is amended by inserting (7 U.S.C. 2204–2) after section 2.
Section 4 of the Act of April 4, 1940 (known as the Agriculture Regulatory Act) (7 U.S.C. 2204–4) is amended by inserting (7 U.S.C. 2204–2) after section 2.
Section 5 of the Act of April 4, 1940 (known as the Agriculture Regulatory Act) (7 U.S.C. 2204–5) is amended by inserting (7 U.S.C. 2204–1 et seq.) after this Act.
Section 10 of the Act of June 29, 1935 (known as the Agricultural Research Act and the Bankhead-Jones Act) (7 U.S.C. 3105) is amended as follows:

subparagraph.text: Subsection (a) is amended by inserting (7 U.S.C. 3104) after section 1 of this title.
Subsection (b) (matter before paragraph (1)) is amended by inserting (7 U.S.C. 3104) after section 1.

paragraph.text: Section 7521(b) of the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 3202(b)) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157(b)).

Section 1445(b)(2)(A) of the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977 (7 U.S.C. 3222(b)(2)(A)) is amended by striking (79 Stat. 431; 7 U.S.C. 450i) and inserting (79 Stat. 431; 7 U.S.C. 3157).
Section 1463(c) of the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977 (7 U.S.C. 3311(c)) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157(b), (c)).

Section 1469(a)(1) of the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977 (7 U.S.C. 3315(a)(1)) is amended by striking sections 2(e), 2(f), and 2(h) of the Act of August 4, 1965 (79 Stat. 431; 7 U.S.C. 450i) and inserting sections 2(f), 2(g), and 2(i) of the Act of August 4, 1965 (79 Stat. 431; 7 U.S.C. 3157(f), (g), (i)).
Section 1473 of the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977 (7 U.S.C. 3319) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157(c)(1)(B)).
Section 1492(d)(5) of the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977 (7 U.S.C. 3371(d)(5)) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157).
Section 2 of Public Law 90–484 (7 U.S.C. 4552) is amended by inserting (7 U.S.C. 4551 et seq.) after this Act.
Section 3 of Public Law 90–484 (7 U.S.C. 4553) is amended by inserting (7 U.S.C. 4551 et seq.) after this Act.
Section 1671(d) of the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 (7 U.S.C. 5924(d)) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157(b)(4), (7), (8), (11)(B)).
Section 1672 of the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 (7 U.S.C. 5925) is amended as follows:

subparagraph.text: Subsection (b)(1) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157(b)(4), (7), (8), (11)(B)).
Subsection (e)(3) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i(b)) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157(b)(4), (7), (8), (11)(B)).

paragraph.text: Section 1672B(b) of the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 (7 U.S.C. 5925b(b)) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157(b)(4), (7), (8), (11)(B)).
Section 1672D(c) of the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 (7 U.S.C. 5925f(c)) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i(b)) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157(b)(4), (7), (8), (11)(B)).
Section 1673(b) of the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 (7 U.S.C. 5926(b)) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i(b)(7)) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157(b)(7)).
Section 251(f)(1)(D)(i) of the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 (7 U.S.C. 6971(f)(1)(D)(i)) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i(b)) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157(b)).
Section 7506(e) of the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 7614c(e)) is amended as follows:

subparagraph.text: Paragraph (2)(C)(i) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i(b)(2)) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157(b)(2)).
Paragraph (4)(A) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i(b)) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157(b)).

paragraph.text: Section 413(e)(2) of the Agricultural Research, Extension, and Education Reform Act of 1998 (7 U.S.C. 7633(e)(2)) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i(b)) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157(b)(4), (7), (8), (11)(B)).

Section 617(c)(3) of the Agricultural Research, Extension, and Education Reform Act of 1998 (7 U.S.C. 7655b(c)(3)) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157(b)(4), (7), (8), (11)(B)).
Section 7526(c)(1)(A)(i) of the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 8114(c)(1)(A)(i)) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 450i(b)(7)) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 3157(b)(7)).

The 6th proviso in the first paragraph under the heading ANIMAL AND PLANT HEALTH INSPECTION SERVICE in title I of H.R. 3037, 99th Congress (known as the Agriculture, Rural Development, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 1986), incorporated by reference in section 101(a) of Public Law 99–190, and enacted into law by section 106 of Public Law 100–202 (7 U.S.C. 8351 note) is amended by striking (46 Stat. 1468; 7 U.S.C. 426–426b) and inserting (46 Stat. 1468; 7 U.S.C. 8351, 8352).
Section 3 of the Act of March 2, 1931 (7 U.S.C. 8352) is amended by inserting (7 U.S.C. 8351, 8352) after this Act.

Section 749 of the Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2006 (7 U.S.C. 8354) is amended by striking sections 426–426c of title 7, United States Code and inserting the Act of March 2, 1931 (46 Stat. 1468; 7 U.S.C. 8351, 8352) and the 7th proviso in the first paragraph under the heading ANIMAL AND PLANT HEALTH INSPECTION SERVICE in title I of the Rural Development, Agriculture, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 1988 (101 Stat. 1329–331; 7 U.S.C. 8353).

section.text: Section 541(b)(3) of title 11, United States Code, is amended by striking (20 U.S.C. 1001 et seq.; 42 U.S.C. 2751 et seq.) and inserting (20 U.S.C. 1001 et seq.).

paragraph.text: Section 339(f)(4)(D) of the Department of the Interior and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2000 (Public Law 106–113, division B, section 1000(a)(3), 16 U.S.C. 528 note) is amended by striking The Act of August 8, 1937, and the Act of May 24, 1939 (43 U.S.C. 1181a et seq.) and inserting The Act of August 28, 1937, and the Act of May 24, 1939 (43 U.S.C. 2601 et seq.).
Section 1 of the Act of July 3, 1956 (16 U.S.C. 667f) is amended by—

subparagraph.text: inserting (16 U.S.C. 667f et seq.) after this Act; and
inserting (16 U.S.C. 667f–1) after section 2 hereof.

paragraph.text: Section 3 of the Act of July 3, 1956 (16 U.S.C. 667f–2) is amended by—

subparagraph.text: inserting (16 U.S.C. 667f–1) after section 2; and
inserting (16 U.S.C. 667f et seq.) after this Act.

paragraph.text: Section 4 of the Act of July 3, 1956 (16 U.S.C. 667f–3) is amended by inserting (16 U.S.C. 667f et seq.) after this Act.
Section 1 of Public Law 87–152 (16 U.S.C. 667g) is amended by inserting (16 U.S.C. 667g et seq.) after State agencies for purposes of this Act.
Section 2 of Public Law 87–152 (16 U.S.C. 667g–1) is amended by inserting (16 U.S.C. 667g et seq.) after this Act.
Section 3 of Public Law 87–152 (16 U.S.C. 667g–2) is amended by inserting (16 U.S.C. 667g et seq.) after this Act.

The 4th proviso in the 2nd paragraph under the heading FEDERAL AID IN WILDLIFE RESTORATION in the Interior Department Appropriation Act, 1943, at 56 Stat. 558 (16 U.S.C. 753) is amended by striking (5 U.S.C. 563–564) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 2279i, 2220).
Section 7(c) of the Cooperative Forestry Assistance Act of 1978 (16 U.S.C. 2103c(c)) is amended by striking (7 U.S.C. 428a(a) and inserting (7 U.S.C. 2268a(a)).

Section 10(3) of the Fish and Wildlife Conservation Act of 1980 (16 U.S.C. 2909(3)) is amended by striking (46 Stat. 1468–1469; 7 U.S.C. 426–426b) and inserting (46 Stat. 1468, 1469; 7 U.S.C. 8351, 8352).
Section 814(b)(5) of the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act (16 U.S.C. 6813(b)(5)) is amended by—

subparagraph.text: striking August 8, 1937 and inserting August 28, 1937; and
striking (43 U.S.C. 1181f et seq.) and inserting (43 U.S.C. 2621 et seq.).

paragraph.text: Section 3(10) of the Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000 (16 U.S.C. 7102(10)) is amended by—

subparagraph.text: striking (chapter 876; 50 Stat. 875; 43 U.S.C. 1181f) and inserting (chapter 876; 50 Stat. 875; 43 U.S.C. 2605); and
striking (chapter 144; 53 Stat. 753; 43 U.S.C. 1181f–1 et seq.) and inserting (chapter 144; 53 Stat. 753; 43 U.S.C. 2621 et seq.).

paragraph.text: Section 415C(b)(3)(C) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1070c–2(b)(3)(C)) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–53(b)(1)) after section 443(b)(1).
Section 428G(d)(2) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1078–7(d)(2)) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–53(b)(4)) after section 443(b)(4) of the Act.

Section 131(c) of the Higher Education Amendments of 1968 (Public Law 90–575, 20 U.S.C. 1087–51 note) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–51 et seq.) after part C of title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965.
Section 442 of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1087–52) is amended as follows:

subparagraph.text: Subsection (a)(1) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–51(b)) after section 441(b).
Subsection (b)(1) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–51(b)) after section 441(b).
Subsection (b)(2)(A)(iii) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–51(b)) after section 441(b).

paragraph.text: Section 403(b)(1) of the Higher Education Amendments of 1986 (Public Law 99–498, 20 U.S.C. 1087–52 note) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–52) after Section 442 of the Act.
Section 443(b)(2)(B) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1087–53(b)(2)(B)) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–56) after section 446 of this part.

Section 403(b)(2) of the Higher Education Amendments of 1986 (Public Law 99–498, 20 U.S.C. 1087–53 note) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–53(c), 1087–56, 1087–57) after Sections 443(c), 446, and 447 of the Act.
Section 445 of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1087–55) is amended as follows:

subparagraph.text: Subsection (a)(2) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–53) after section 443.
Subsection (d)(1)(C) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–53) after section 443.

paragraph.text: Section 446(a)(1) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1087–56(a)(1)) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–52) after section 442.
Section 447(b) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1087–57(b)) is amended as follows:

subparagraph.text: Paragraph (1) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–53(b)(2)(A)) after section 443(b)(2)(A).
Paragraph (2) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–53(b)(2)(A)) after section 443(b)(2)(A).

paragraph.text: Section 448(b)(2)(C) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1087–58(b)(2)(C)) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–53, 1087–56) after section 443 or 446.

Section 406(b)(3) of the Higher Education Amendments of 1986 (Public Law 99–498, 20 U.S.C. 1087kk note) is amended by striking sections 413D(d)(2)(B), 442(d)(2)(B) and 462(d)(2)(B) and inserting sections 413D(c)(2)(B), 442(d)(2)(B), and 462(d)(2)(B) (20 U.S.C. 1070b–3(c)(2)(B), 1087–52(d)(2)(B), 1087bb(d)(2)(B)).
Section 488 of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1095) is amended as follows:

subparagraph.text: Paragraph (1) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–52) after or 442.
Paragraph (2) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–52) after section 442.
Paragraph (3) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–52) after section 442.

section.text: Section 12 of the Act of May 29, 1884 (known as the Animal Industry Act) (21 U.S.C. 113a) is amended by inserting (7 U.S.C. 3105(a)) after section 10(a) of the Bankhead-Jones Act of 1935.
Section 117(c)(2)(C) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 (26 U.S.C. 117(c)(2)(C)) is amended by inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–58(e)) after section 448(e) of the Higher Education Act of 1965.

paragraph.text: Section 257(a) of the Biomass Energy and Alcohol Fuels Act of 1980 (42 U.S.C. 8852(a)) is amended by inserting (7 U.S.C. 3104) after section 1 of the Bankhead-Jones Act.
Section 118 of the National and Community Service Act of 1990 (42 U.S.C. 12561) is amended as follows:

subparagraph.text: Subsection (b)(5) is amended by striking (42 U.S.C. 2751 et seq.) and inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–51 et seq.).
Subsection (g) is amended by—

clause.text: striking (42 U.S.C. 2753(b)(2)(A)) and inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–53(b)(2)(A)); and
striking (42 U.S.C. 2751 et seq.) and inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–51 et seq.).

paragraph.text: Section 118A(b)(2) of the National and Community Service Act of 1990 (42 U.S.C. 12561a(b)(2)) is amended as follows:

subparagraph.text: Subparagraph (B) is amended by striking (42 U.S.C. 2751(c)) and inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–51(c)).
Subparagraph (C) is amended by striking (42 U.S.C. 2751 et seq.) and inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–51 et seq.).

paragraph.text: Section 122(c)(1)(C)(i) of the National and Community Service Act of 1990 (42 U.S.C. 12572(c)(1)(C)(i)) is amended by striking (42 U.S.C. 2751 et seq.) and inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–51 et seq.).
Section 140(a)(3) of the National and Community Service Act of 1990 (42 U.S.C. 12594(a)(3)) is amended by striking (42 U.S.C. 2751 et seq.) and inserting (20 U.S.C. 1087–51 et seq.).
Section 6 of the Act of June 14, 1926 (known as the Recreation and Public Purposes Act) (43 U.S.C. 869–4) is amended by—

subparagraph.text: striking (43 U.S.C. 1181f) and inserting (43 U.S.C. 2605); and
striking (53 Stat. 753) and inserting (53 Stat. 753; 43 U.S.C. 2621 et seq.).

paragraph.text: Section 701(b) of the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 (Public Law 94–579, 43 U.S.C. 1701 note) is amended by striking (50 Stat. 874; 43 U.S.C. 1181a–1181j) and inserting (50 U.S.C. 874; 43 U.S.C. 2601 et seq.).

Section 305(b) of the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 (43 U.S.C. 1735(b)) is amended by striking (50 Stat. 874; 43 U.S.C. 1181a–1181j) and inserting (50 Stat. 874; 43 U.S.C. 2601 et seq.).
Section 401(b)(1) of the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 (43 U.S.C. 1751(b)(1)) is amended by striking (50 Stat. 874; 43 U.S.C. 1181d) and inserting (50 Stat. 874; 43 U.S.C. 2603).

Section 402(a) of the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 (43 U.S.C. 1752(a)) is amended by striking (50 Stat. 874, as amended; 43 U.S.C. 1181a–1181j) and inserting (50 Stat. 874, as amended; 43 U.S.C. 2601 et seq.).
The last paragraph of title II of the Act of August 28, 1937, at 50 Stat. 876 (ch. 876, 43 U.S.C. 2601 note) is amended by inserting (43 U.S.C. 2601 et seq.) after in conflict with this Act.
Section 4 of the Act of August 28, 1937 (43 U.S.C. 2603) is amended by—

subparagraph.text: inserting (43 U.S.C. 2601 et seq.) after this Act; and
inserting (43 U.S.C. 2601) after section 1.

paragraph.text: Section 5 of the Act of August 28, 1937 (43 U.S.C. 2604) is amended by inserting (43 U.S.C. 2601 et seq.) after this Act.
Subsection (c) of title II of the Act of August 28, 1937 (43 U.S.C. 2605(c)) is amended by inserting (43 U.S.C. 2601 et seq.) after this Act.
Section 1 of the Act of May 24, 1939 (43 U.S.C. 2621) is amended by inserting (43 U.S.C. 2621 et seq.) after passage of this Act.
Section 5 of the Act of May 24, 1939 (ch. 144, 43 U.S.C. 2621 note) is amended by inserting (43 U.S.C. 2621 et seq.) after this Act.
Section 2 of the Act of May 24, 1939 (43 U.S.C. 2622) is amended by—

subparagraph.text: inserting (43 U.S.C. 2621) after section 1 hereof; and
inserting (43 U.S.C. 2621 et seq.) after provided for in this Act.

paragraph.text: Section 4 of the Act of May 24, 1939 (43 U.S.C. 2624) is amended by striking (50 Stat. 874) and inserting (50 Stat. 874; 43 U.S.C. 2601 et seq.).
Section 3 of the Act of June 24, 1954 (43 U.S.C. 2633) is amended by—

subparagraph.text: inserting (43 U.S.C. 2631) after in which the lands described in section 1 of this Act;
striking (50 Stat. 874) and inserting (50 Stat. 875; 43 U.S.C. 2605); and
inserting (43 U.S.C. 2601 et seq.) after and upon such designation the provisions of that Act.

paragraph.text: Section 4 of the Act of June 24, 1954 (43 U.S.C. 2634) is amended by inserting (43 U.S.C. 2632, 2633) after sections 2 and 3 of this Act.
Section 2 of Public Law 90–583 (43 U.S.C. 2702) is amended by inserting (43 U.S.C. 2701) after section 1 of this Act.

section.text: Section 105(f)(1)(B)(iii) (matter before subclause (I)) of the Compact of Free Association Amendments Act of 2003 (48 U.S.C. 1921d(f)(1)(B)(iii) (matter before subclause (I))) is amended by striking (20 U.S.C. 1070b et seq., 42 U.S.C. 2751 et seq.) and inserting (20 U.S.C. 1070b et seq., 1087–51 et seq.).
